(PASSIVE) SUNLIGHT
                                Abilities apply Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. Other allied champions consume Sunlight when damaging enemies, dealing 34 bonus magic damage (+9  160 max).

(W) ECLIPSE
 14/13/12/11s   60 
                                
                                
                                For 3 seconds gain 40 Armor (40/60/80/100 + 20% ) and 40 Magic Resist (40/60/80/100 + 20% ).After the effects ends nearby enemies take 80 magic damage (80/115/150/185 + 40% ). If an enemy is hit, Leona retains her defensive bonuses for 3 seconds.

 12/10/8/6s   60

 55/45/35s   100
